Would like to start a workflow at sunrise or sunset based on a GPS location provided

**Describe the solution you'd like**

1. the GPS coordinates

comments.body: This is an interesting idea but it seems like very niche functionality, and I don't think we want to build that into the server. Instead, we plan to expose an option in the [schedules feature](https://docs.temporal.io/workflows#schedule) (note: not the older "cron" feature whose docs you linked to) to supply a list of absolute timestamps. You could compute the list yourself and keep it updated periodically to achieve this effect. In the meantime, you could use the schedules feature with a list of calendar specs to achieve the same effect.

title: Run workflows at sunset or sunrises
